sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function OneMovie( {movieSelect} ) { console.log(movieSelect); const { backdrop_path, title, vote_average, tagline, overview, release_date, budget, poster_path } = movieSelect; return(

{title}

Rating: {vote_average}

{tagline}

{title}

Release date: {release_date}

Budget: {new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', {style: 'currency', currency: 'USD'}).format(budget)}

Story: {overview}

) } export default OneMovie;
